As the old saying goes, practice makes perfect. English Week is a good way to improve English.
Introduce the background of English Week(time, place and object)
Last week our school held an English Week. During the week, we participated in many English activities. Our English ability has greatly improved.
As the old saying goes, practice makes perfect. English Week is a good way to improve English.
Introduce the background of English Week(time, place and object)
We sang English songs and joined in English speaking contests.
We put on short English plays and watched English films.

compositionContent.title: English Week
paragraph: Last week our school held an English Week. It started on March 15 and ended on March 21. All the students and teachers, including two foreign teachers from America participated in it.

During that week, we sang quite a few English songs and joined in English speaking contests to develop our interest in English. In addition, we put on short English plays and watched some English films, from which we learned a lot. Besides, we had a wonderful time guessing English riddles.

As everyone knows, practice makes perfect. As a result of this English week, many of us became more interested in English and our speaking ability has greatly improved. I think it's an effective way to learn English, so I enjoyed it very much.

data.text: Whether to buy a laptop or not?
Whether freshmen should buy a laptop when they go to university.
It is unnecessary to buy a laptop for freshmen when they go to university.
Whether to buy a laptop or not?
Whether freshmen should buy a laptop when they go to university.
It is unnecessary to buy a laptop for freshmen when they go to university.
Most people think freshmen should have a laptop.
Freshmen deserve a laptop as reward for their great efforts and achievements.
Having a laptop will bring more convenience to studies and freshmen can have easier access to the Internet.
To buy a laptop will add to the financial burden of some families.
Many universities are equipped with adequate computers for use.

compositionContent.title: Whether to buy a laptop or not?
paragraph: Is it necessary for freshmen to have a laptop when they go to university? Different people have different ideas.

Most people are in favor of it. First of all, freshmen deserve a laptop as reward for their great efforts and achievements. In addition, having a laptop in hand will bring more convenience to their studies and they can have easier access to the Internet, which will in turn benefit them.

However, some people hold opposite opinions. Their reasons are as follows. First, it will add to the financial burden of some families. Besides, many universities are equipped with adequate computers for use.
Personally speaking, I believe it is unnecessary to buy a laptop for freshmen. They may be addicted to computer games, which will have bad effects on their studies.

The Spring Festival is the most important festival in China.

There are many celebration activities during the Spring Festival.
The Spring Festival is the most important festival in China.

A month before the festival, people are prepared for the festival.

Introduce people's activities on New Year's Eve.
Introduce people's activities on Lunar New Year's Day.
Point out how long the new year celebration activities will last and review all the activities.

compositionContent.title: The Spring Festival
paragraph: The Spring Festival is the most important festival in China. It is on January 1st according to the Chinese lunar calendar. It is China's New Year's Day.
Usually a month before the festival, people begin to buy food, clothes and decorations for houses.

About a week before the festival, housewives are busy preparing the new year dinner. And they will do a lot of washing and cleaning in the house. People who are far away on business are hurrying to return home for the new year's family reunion.

On New Year's Eve, each family will gather together eating, talking and watching TV for almost the whole night. And there will be some interesting programs on TV. The children are the happiest of all because they can get presents from their parents or grandparents.
On Lunar New Year's Day, after getting up, people will eat dumplings. When they meet their neighbors or friends, they'll say: “Happy New Year!”
The new year celebrating activities will last about half a month.
